an4.191:4.1: * “Sotānugatānaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammānaṃ, vacasā paricitānaṃ, manasānupekkhitānaṃ, diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhānaṃ cattāro ānisaṃsā pāṭikaṅkhā.
an4.191:4.4: suttaṃ, geyyaṃ, veyyākaraṇaṃ, gāthaṃ, udānaṃ, itivuttakaṃ, jātakaṃ, abbhutadhammaṃ, vedallaṃ.
an4.191:4.5: Tassa te dhammā sotānugatā honti, vacasā paricitā, manasānupekkhitā, diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā.
an4.191:4.6: So muṭṭhassati kālaṃ kurumāno aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ upapajjati.
an4.191:4.7: Tassa tattha sukhino dhammapadā plavanti.
an4.191:4.9: atha so satto khippaṃyeva visesagāmī hoti.
an4.191:4.10: Sotānugatānaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammānaṃ, vacasā paricitānaṃ, manasānupekkhitānaṃ, diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhānaṃ ayaṃ paṭhamo ānisaṃso pāṭikaṅkho.
an4.191:5.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇāti—
an4.191:5.2: suttaṃ, geyyaṃ, veyyākaraṇaṃ, gāthaṃ, udānaṃ, itivuttakaṃ, jātakaṃ, abbhutadhammaṃ, vedallaṃ.
an4.191:5.3: Tassa te dhammā sotānugatā honti, vacasā paricitā, manasānupekkhitā, diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā.
an4.191:5.4: So muṭṭhassati kālaṃ kurumāno aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ upapajjati.
an4.191:5.5: Tassa tattha na heva kho sukhino dhammapadā plavanti;
an4.191:5.6: api ca kho bhikkhu iddhimā cetovasippatto devaparisāyaṃ dhammaṃ deseti.
an4.191:5.8: ‘ayaṃ vā so dhammavinayo, yatthāhaṃ pubbe brahmacariyaṃ acarin’ti.
an4.191:5.10: atha so satto khippameva visesagāmī hoti.
an4.191:5.13: Tassa na heva kho assa kaṅkhā vā vimati vā:
an4.191:5.14: ‘bherisaddo nu kho, na nu kho bherisaddo’ti.
an4.191:5.16: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇāti—
an4.191:5.17: suttaṃ, geyyaṃ, veyyākaraṇaṃ, gāthaṃ, udānaṃ, itivuttakaṃ, jātakaṃ, abbhutadhammaṃ, vedallaṃ.
an4.191:5.18: Tassa te dhammā sotānugatā honti, vacasā paricitā, manasānupekkhitā, diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā.
an4.191:5.19: So muṭṭhassati kālaṃ kurumāno aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ upapajjati.
an4.191:5.20: Tassa tattha na heva kho sukhino dhammapadā plavanti;
an4.191:5.21: api ca kho bhikkhu iddhimā cetovasippatto devaparisāyaṃ dhammaṃ deseti.
an4.191:5.23: ‘ayaṃ vā so dhammavinayo, yatthāhaṃ pubbe brahmacariyaṃ acarin’ti.
an4.191:5.25: atha so satto khippaṃyeva visesagāmī hoti.
an4.191:5.26: Sotānugatānaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammānaṃ, vacasā paricitānaṃ, manasānupekkhitānaṃ, diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhānaṃ ayaṃ dutiyo ānisaṃso pāṭikaṅkho.
an4.191:6.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇāti—
an4.191:6.2: suttaṃ, geyyaṃ, veyyākaraṇaṃ, gāthaṃ, udānaṃ, itivuttakaṃ, jātakaṃ, abbhutadhammaṃ, vedallaṃ.
an4.191:6.3: Tassa te dhammā sotānugatā honti, vacasā paricitā, manasānupekkhitā, diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā.
an4.191:6.4: So muṭṭhassati kālaṃ kurumāno aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ upapajjati.
an4.191:6.5: Tassa tattha na heva kho sukhino dhammapadā plavanti, napi bhikkhu iddhimā cetovasippatto devaparisāyaṃ dhammaṃ deseti;
an4.191:6.6: api ca kho devaputto devaparisāyaṃ dhammaṃ deseti.
an4.191:6.8: ‘ayaṃ vā so dhammavinayo, yatthāhaṃ pubbe brahmacariyaṃ acarin’ti.
an4.191:6.10: atha so satto khippaṃyeva visesagāmī hoti.
an4.191:6.13: Tassa na heva kho assa kaṅkhā vā vimati vā:
an4.191:6.14: ‘saṅkhasaddo nu kho, na nu kho saṅkhasaddo’ti.
an4.191:6.16: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇāti—
an4.191:6.17: suttaṃ, geyyaṃ, veyyākaraṇaṃ, gāthaṃ, udānaṃ, itivuttakaṃ, jātakaṃ, abbhutadhammaṃ, vedallaṃ.
an4.191:6.18: Tassa te dhammā sotānugatā honti, vacasā paricitā, manasānupekkhitā, diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā.
an4.191:6.19: So muṭṭhassati kālaṃ kurumāno aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ upapajjati.
an4.191:6.20: Tassa tattha na heva kho sukhino dhammapadā plavanti, napi bhikkhu iddhimā cetovasippatto devaparisāyaṃ dhammaṃ deseti;
an4.191:6.21: api ca kho devaputto devaparisāyaṃ dhammaṃ deseti.
an4.191:6.23: ‘ayaṃ vā so dhammavinayo, yatthāhaṃ pubbe brahmacariyaṃ acarin’ti.
an4.191:6.25: atha so satto khippaṃyeva visesagāmī hoti.
an4.191:6.26: Sotānugatānaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammānaṃ, vacasā paricitānaṃ, manasānupekkhitānaṃ, diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhānaṃ ayaṃ tatiyo ānisaṃso pāṭikaṅkho.
an4.191:7.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇāti—
an4.191:7.2: suttaṃ, geyyaṃ, veyyākaraṇaṃ, gāthaṃ, udānaṃ, itivuttakaṃ, jātakaṃ, abbhutadhammaṃ, vedallaṃ.
an4.191:7.3: Tassa te dhammā sotānugatā honti, vacasā paricitā, manasānupekkhitā, diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā.
an4.191:7.4: So muṭṭhassati kālaṃ kurumāno aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ upapajjati.
an4.191:7.5: Tassa tattha na heva kho sukhino dhammapadā plavanti, napi bhikkhu iddhimā cetovasippatto devaparisāyaṃ dhammaṃ deseti, napi devaputto devaparisāyaṃ dhammaṃ deseti;
an4.191:7.6: api ca kho opapātiko opapātikaṃ sāreti:
an4.191:7.7: ‘sarasi tvaṃ, mārisa, sarasi tvaṃ, mārisa, yattha mayaṃ pubbe brahmacariyaṃ acarimhā’ti.
an4.191:7.11: atha so satto khippaṃyeva visesagāmī hoti.
an4.191:7.12: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, dve sahāyakā sahapaṃsukīḷikā.
an4.191:7.13: Te kadāci karahaci aññamaññaṃ<span class="var" title=" samāgaccheyyuṃ, tamenaṃ (sī , syā1-3, kaṃ, pā1)" id="note467"> samāgaccheyyuṃ.
an4.191:7.14: Añño pana sahāyako sahāyakaṃ evaṃ vadeyya:
an4.191:7.18: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇāti—
an4.191:7.19: suttaṃ, geyyaṃ, veyyākaraṇaṃ, gāthaṃ, udānaṃ, itivuttakaṃ, jātakaṃ, abbhutadhammaṃ, vedallaṃ.
an4.191:7.20: Tassa te dhammā sotānugatā honti, vacasā paricitā, manasānupekkhitā, diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā.
an4.191:7.21: So muṭṭhassati kālaṃ kurumāno aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ upapajjati.
an4.191:7.22: Tassa tattha na heva kho sukhino dhammapadā plavanti, napi bhikkhu iddhimā cetovasippatto devaparisāyaṃ dhammaṃ deseti, napi devaputto devaparisāyaṃ dhammaṃ deseti;
an4.191:7.23: api ca kho opapātiko opapātikaṃ sāreti:
an4.191:7.24: ‘sarasi tvaṃ, mārisa, sarasi tvaṃ, mārisa, yattha mayaṃ pubbe brahmacariyaṃ acarimhā’ti.
an4.191:7.28: atha kho so satto khippaṃyeva visesagāmī hoti.
an4.191:7.29: Sotānugatānaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammānaṃ, vacasā paricitānaṃ, manasānupekkhitānaṃ, diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhānaṃ ayaṃ catuttho ānisaṃso pāṭikaṅkho.
an4.191:7.30: Sotānugatānaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammānaṃ, vacasā paricitānaṃ, manasānupekkhitānaṃ diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhānaṃ ime cattāro ānisaṃsā pāṭikaṅkhā”ti.
